Class NoteList

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.ArrayList<Note>
              com.myronmarston.music.NoteList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Note>, java.util.Collection<Note>, java.util.List<Note>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class NoteList
extends java.util.ArrayList<Note>

NoteList contains a sequence of notes.

See Also:

parseNoteListString

public static NoteList parseNoteListString(java.lang.String noteListString,
                                           Scale scale)
                                    throws NoteStringParseException
Creates a new note list based on the given note list string.

Parameters:
noteListString - string containing space-seperated notes, each of the form 'F#4,1/4,PP'
scale - the scale to use to determine the note's pitch information
Returns:
the new note list
Throws:
NoteStringParseException - thrown if the note list string is invalid

createAndFillMidiTrack

public javax.sound.midi.Track createAndFillMidiTrack(javax.sound.midi.Sequence sequence,
                                                     Scale scale,
                                                     Fraction startTime)
Fills the given midi track with the notes from this NoteList.

Parameters:
sequence - the midi sequence to add the track to
scale - the scale to use
startTime - the time the first note should be played, in whole notes
Returns:
the midi track that was created and filled

getMidiTickResolution

public static int getMidiTickResolution(java.util.Collection<NoteList> noteLists)
Calculates the optimal midi tick resolution for the given collection of noteLists, based on the duration of the notes.

Parameters:
noteLists - collection of noteLists
Returns:
the midi tick resolution
